title: What is the interpretation of a dream about goats by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a goat: A dream about a goat is considered one of the dreams that causes the dreamer confusion, distracts him, and urges him to search for its meaning and for the goodness and optimism that it brings to upcoming events or leads to evil that he must beware of. The details and symbols that he sees in his dream play a major role in the different interpretation of the vision and in the reflection of his desires and goals, and this is what we will shed light on in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about a goat: Seeing a goat usually indicates good signs for the dreamer that portend a happy life in which he will enjoy great success and material gains. This is due to the variety of images he sees in a dream. What he hopes for is already happening, and God knows best. As for the presence of goats in one of the plains or valleys, it confirms the abundance of food and the multiplicity of good things in a person’s life and that his dreams and desires will come true in the near future. For the comfort and happiness of the dreamer. Walking in a herd of goats in an orderly and calm manner is one of the signs of your successful life and your ability to think wisely and rationally before making important decisions and choices, which makes you enjoy great stability and peace of mind. Interpretation of a dream about goats by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that goats are a symbol of perseverance and struggle in Reality to reach what one intends in dreams and desires, as the dreamer is characterized by ambition and perseverance until he achieves his goal. Profits that exceed his expectations change his life for the better. Feeding a goat in a dream has many different indicators that vary depending on the dreamer’s social status. Seeing a goat in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi indicated many good signs of seeing a goat. If a person is suffering from financial difficulties and crises that make him unable to meet the needs of his family, then seeing a goat climbing a tree until it reaches its food is clear evidence that livelihood is preserved and written for him, but it requires a little effort and effort, and to reach it he must stay away from despair and disappointment. Hope and to always have hope and the strength of faith. But there are other expectations that lead to evil and warn the dreamer of the need to monitor himself if he sees them. Eating lamb or goat meat indicates a serious illness, God forbid, that can cause more physical pain and complications, so he must take care. Good health and go to God Almighty to pray for a speedy recovery. Interpretation of a dream about a single goat: A dream about a goat proves to a single girl that more good things and positive changes will occur in her life in the near future. Also, seeing him in the middle of the plain is a sure sign of a close and happy marriage to a person of high-level wealth and a prominent position in society, and it predicts for her that she will enjoy a high level when she succeeds in her work. Slaughtering her sheep is one of the praiseworthy signs that she has heard the good news and is anticipating happy occasions, which may It consists of inviting those close to her to attend her wedding. Interpretation of a dream about a goat for a married woman: A married woman cooking a goat confirms that she has good qualities and a kind soul that always wants to help others and extend a helping hand to them. The near future. In the event that the priestess suffers from health problems

title: Interpretation of the dream: The time is approaching and the moon is divided, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: The time is approaching and the moon is parting. The moon is one of the surahs of the Holy Qur’an. In our article, we will shed light on the interpretation of the dream of the approaching time and the separation of the moon, Ibn Sirin, in addition to its interpretation: Dreaming of seeing Surah Al-Qamar in a dream. Interpretation of the dream: The time is approaching and the moon is divided, O Ibn Sirinj. It is worth noting that the Holy Qur’an It contains 114 surahs, and we mention that Surat Al-Qamar is one of the surahs that belong to them, and among them is the verse “The Hour has approached and the moon has separated as it is.” Among the dreams that often haunt a person’s sleep, scholars of interpretation and jurisprudence have developed some explanations and interpretations that go back to the interpretation of dreams: The time approached and the moon separated, and we quote some of them from Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of a person dreaming of reciting Surat Al-Qamar while he was in prison as indicating... He will leave him unharmed with the help of God Almighty. Also, if the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Qamar in the dream, this indicates the righteousness of the person after a certain period, that is, after the disappearance of corruption and disobedience to God Almighty. We also find that when a person recites Surat Al-Qamar in a dream, this indicates that this The person was exposed to magic, but it did not harm him, and God Almighty is Most High and knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of a dream about shooting fire in the air in a dream according to Nablus. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surah Al-Qamar in a dream. Surat Al-Qamar is one of the surahs organized in the Holy Qur’an, because it has great value in itself, which distinguishes it. From the rest of the Holy Qur’an. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Qamar in a dream, as narrated by interpretation scholars, including: When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Qamar in the dream, this is a sign that he will be imprisoned. If he sees the recitation of Surat Al-Qamar in a dream, this means that evil will be kept away from him. Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Qamar Surah Al-Qamar in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will come to him on the Day of Resurrection and his face will be filled with light. However, if you see Surah Al-Qamar reading in a dream, it indicates that the dreamer is in a state of doubt. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is reading Surah Al-Qamar, this indicates that the dreamer will be corrected. His affairs after his corruption in religion, and God Almighty is Most High and knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreaming of a red moon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the leading interpretation scholars who excelled in this field, as he worked to interpret the dream completely, according to the connotations and symbols that appeared to the dreamer in the dream, in addition to To take a position. . In the interpretation, we mention some of the interpretations of the dream of the red moon in a dream by Ibn Sirin, including: If he sees the crescent in the dream and it is red in color, this indicates the husband’s love for his wife. But when the red color appears on the moon in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer is very angry. If a married man Whoever sees a red crescent in a dream, this may be a sign that his wife is pregnant, and after that she will miscarry her child later, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about giving a ring to someone by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the moon splitting in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. It is known that the moon splitting is a sign of resurrection. The hour, this means that the reckoning has begun, and a person may worry and remain in a state of insomnia if he sees this dream in his country. Sleeps. , And

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a finger wound in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a severed finger in a dream, as there are many interpretations, meanings and connotations included in this vision, which is classified as one of the disturbing visions that cause suffering to individuals. Good indicators for the fortune teller, and in this article we will explain to you the interpretation of dreams about seeing a cut finger in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cut finger in a dream. Many of these dreams that some people may have in their dreams, some of them are frightening, and cause them anxiety, including cutting off fingers, and this What prompts many people to know the interpretations it contains, and in this paragraph we explain the interpretation of the dream of seeing a cut finger in a dream. It is also: seeing fingers cut off in a dream for one girl. It is a sign of many problems and disagreements that this girl is going through in real life. Also, the girl is not... A married woman who sees this vision is a sign of her distance from the path of God Almighty. It shows the abundance of sins, and the sins they commit, and they must return to God Almighty. Seeing a finger wound in a dream is a sign of losing a loved one, whether it is a mother or father. See also: Interpretation of a dream about duck eggs in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a finger for a single woman. These interpretations included in these dreams that we see in the dream differ, and this is based on the dreamer’s condition, and cutting a person’s finger can be evidence of a bad omen, and in this context we explain the interpretation The dream of cutting off a finger for a single woman is also: This vision is an indication of the failure that the girl will face in her life. Likewise, if an unmarried woman sees in her dream her finger being cut off and she stops praying. This vision is a warning to her, and she must return to God Almighty before being judged. In the event that she sees a girl One of her fingers was cut off in a dream, then a new one was given. This will be good news for this girl who is close to marriage. This dream may indicate that this girl is an obstacle to her family and is likely to lose one of her relatives, and God is Most High and knows that. See also: Interpretation of dreams To see jahamah in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off the finger of someone I know. Many jurists have tried to clarify the meanings and implications contained in these dreams, and they differ based on the details we saw in the dream. Many scholarly interpreters have tried to clarify all the meanings and implications contained in these dreams. In this context, we explain to you the interpretation of a dream about cutting off the finger of someone I know: Seeing fingers in a dream is a sign of the family. If strong hands are seen in the dream, this indicates the love and cohesion of the family. If an increase in the number of fingers appears in the dream, this dream is evidence of the presence Two enemies in the dreamer's life. If one sees in his dream that one of his fingers has been cut off and after it has been cut off, he turns his finger back. This is a sign that the dreamer is exposed to worries, but he will soon get rid of problems once and for all, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: I dreamed that I found gold and took it to the top interpreters for married and single women. Interpretation of a dream about Q

title: Interpretation of a dream about practicing sodomy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream. It is one of the visions that is seriously disturbing when witnessed, because sodomy is an abnormal and forbidden thing. Therefore, when sodomy is witnessed, the dreamer quickly searches for the meaning of this vision that makes him feel reassured. You may also see a lion in a dream. We will try to provide information about the dream of sodomy. In a dream, according to sheikhs and dream interpretation scholars, so that the reader knows the meaning of this vision, but without inferring it, because it cannot be left out. Interpretation of one vision to another vision, even if there is a great similarity between them, because this may lead to problems for the dreamer because it depicts wrong thinking. Interpretation of a dream about a son marrying his mother in a dream: This dream indicates how good this son is to his parents. It symbolizes a lot of money that he will receive He has a son from his mother in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wife in a dream shows that this wife will have many happy occasions in the coming days. This dream could also be a sign that the disputes between the husband and his wife will end soon. If there are indeed differences between them. It symbolizes that this wife will be blessed by God Almighty to become pregnant soon. Interpretation of seeing a wedding party in a dream with someone the dreamer knows: This vision may indicate that differences will end between the dreamer and the person he was with in the dream. It indicates that The dreamer will work with this person in some business and this business will be successful and will bring a lot of profit. It indicates that the dreamer will obtain advantages from this person. Read also: Toilet in a dreamInterpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing sodomy in a dreamRead also: Washing The DeadIbn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing practicing homosexuality in a dream symbolizes material things and says that homosexuality in a dream can be good news for getting rid of enemies and achieving victory over them. Also, sodomy in a dream can be a sign of the presence of an evil friend who will help in sin. He says Ibn Sirin also stated that sodomy in a dream could be an indication that the dreamer’s life is full of disobedience, sins, and matters bordering on disbelief. If the dreamer sees that there are two people practicing sodomy with each other, this may be a symbol that someone is encouraging the dreamer to do bad deeds and disobedience. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. I dreamed that my friend was rude to me. Sodomy is one of the greatest sins, and sodomy is one of the toxic behaviors that is completely forbidden by Sharia law. Sodomy in a dream can be interpreted because sometimes it can be beneficial and beneficial, such as a joint project or trade in which there is a partnership or a lineage relationship, where Sometimes it indicates distance from God’s approach. The interpretation is primarily based on the state of opinion, as this opinion is from people of desires and sins. As for the one who approaches God and performs prayer, this dream indicates righteousness and benefit to him. Also, the person who dreams that he is performing this act with a friend, this may be An indication that he is following Satan. Read also: Penguin in a dream, seeing the wedding from behind in a dream, indicating a

title: What is the interpretation of the appearance of a black man in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the appearance of a black man in a dream. A black man in a dream is always interpreted as pessimism and bad news, but there are some exceptions in which a black man in a dream can be a sign of goodness. Seeing a black man in a dream Interpretation of a black man in a dream If he is smiling, this is an indication On the positive news that the dreamer will be happy with, his family crises will disappear, and all his professional problems will be solved, as well as his family and social problems. A smile in general in a dream is a praiseworthy symbol. If the black man in the dream is frowning and angry, this indicates the presence of adversity and distress in the dreamer’s life. The interpretation of the black man in the dream indicates happiness and joy if he has gifts such as fruits and fruits, and the fresher these fruits are And edible, the better the scene and its more promising connotations. Seeing a black person is interpreted as goodness and happiness, if he is a police officer or a judge. If a married woman sees a black face in a dream, this means that she will face problems in her life that she will not be able to overcome. A black man in a dream Al-OsaimiWhen Seeing a familiar person with a black face, the interpretation of this dream is that these people need material, psychological or moral help. Seeing a famous person in a dream with a black face can be interpreted as this person’s illness. Seeing a familiar person in a dream with a black face and wearing white clothes means That he will be blessed with a girl whose livelihood will be great and who will be the reason for his happiness. Seeing an unmarried girl with a black man means that there will be good news in her next life. Seeing an unmarried woman with a black face in a dream means that this girl will face a problem, and the dreamer will help her get out of this problem easily Interpretation of a dream about a black man by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin disagreed with a large number of jurists who praised the vision of a young man with brown hair, and said that the appearance of a man with dark skin in a dream has many disgusting connotations, such as: First: In reference to sadness and happiness in leaving the dreamer’s home. Ibn Sirin realized that the period during which the dreamer feels anxious and sad will be short and we will give examples of bad events that will happen to the dreamer: He may feel weak and physically weak and after a medical examination he will be surprised that he is sick and needs a period of cessation from work and daily tasks to recover from the illness. If the dreamer feels upset In her job, the vision may reveal that she will leave the job and suffer a period of unemployment, after which she will regain her professional activity by entering a comfortable job other than the previous job. Perhaps the interpretation of the dream is that the dreamer’s financial conditions will drop to the level of drought and poverty and he will live in misery for a short period. Perhaps the anxiety that the dreamer will experience Soon it translates that one of his children will fall victim to an illness, but he must be sure that all these circumstances are temporary and will pass successfully and without loss. If the dreamer is married and sees a black man in his dream, perhaps the meaning of the vision is that his married life will be a bit turbulent, and then it will be stable with permission God, sorrows and sorrows differ

Ibn Sirin realized that the period during which the dreamer feels anxious and sad will be short and we will give examples of bad events that will happen to the dreamer: He may feel weak and physically weak and after a medical examination he will be surprised that he is sick and needs a period of cessation from work and daily tasks to recover from the illness. If the dreamer feels upset In her job, the vision may reveal that she will leave the job and suffer a period of unemployment, after which she will regain her professional activity by entering a comfortable job other than the previous job. Perhaps the interpretation of the dream is that the dreamer’s financial conditions will drop to the level of drought and poverty and he will live in misery for a short period. Perhaps the anxiety that the dreamer will experience Soon it translates that one of his children will fall victim to an illness, but he must be sure that all these circumstances are temporary and will pass successfully and without loss. If the dreamer is married and sees a black man in his dream, perhaps the meaning of the vision is that his married life will be a bit turbulent, and then it will be stable with permission God, sorrows and sorrows differ

title: Interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a new house through seeing the website roy2a.com. Seeing a new house in a dream can cause a feeling of happiness and joy for whoever sees it, especially if this house is spacious and beautiful. Interpretation of a new house. A new house in a dream also has good connotations in most cases and in some Cases are a harbinger of evil. The meaning of the vision varies between interpreters, depending on the condition of the house, as well as depending on the condition and circumstances of the dreamer and whether the man or woman is single, married, pregnant or divorced. Today through the vision website we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing the new house in a dream based on the opinion of leading interpreters such as Ibn . Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees in a dream a new house: Seeing a new house in a dream indicates goodness and a lot of money that comes to the dreamer. Seeing a new house in a dream indicates a change in the pioneer’s financial circumstances for the better. See also Interpretation of seeing a burning house in a dream: What is the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen seeing a new house in a dream: Seeing a new house in a dream indicates the comfortable and stable life that the dreamer will live. Seeing a new house in a dream indicates abandoning sins and repenting to God Almighty. Seeing the new house, its owner, and its location are unknown to the dreamer. It indicates that the dreamer commits many sins and must review his actions and repent to God. Seeing moving from a new spacious house to a new narrow house indicates financial losses and financial crises that the viewer will be exposed to. See also: Interpretation of seeing a house drowning in water in a dream. What is the interpretation of a vision? A new house in a dream for a man: Seeing a man’s new house in a dream indicates what the dreamer will achieve in terms of success and success, and what he will gain from following an extensive diet in his life. A man sees in a dream a new house with a spacious garden, it indicates bliss, the luxury of life, the soundness of his religion, and the steadfastness of his religion. Seeing one's new house in a dream denotes that he will soon marry a girl with good morals. Seeing a beautiful new house in a dream for a patient indicates the approach of his recovery and the person concerned indicates the relief of his fears. Seeing a married man building a new house in a dream shows that she will get a lot of money or You will get a friend soon. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a house. What is the interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream for a single woman: Seeing single women in a new, spacious house in a dream indicates the approach of her marriage to a prominent person among the people. Seeing a new house in a dream shows that she will live a happy, stable, and better life. Than before. Seeing isolated people, a new house with many windows shows that he will achieve the goals he is trying to achieve. What is the interpretation of seeing a new house in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a new, spacious house in a dream indicates the abundance of livelihood that will come to her husband and the kindness that will come to him. Her house. Seeing a married woman in a new, cramped house in a dream indicates the passage of financial hardship and difficulty in her affairs. Seeing a married woman in a dream indicates the passage of financial hardship and difficulty in her affairs.

title: The meaning of a dream about traveling to Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams is an important science that has many ancient and modern books that deal with the interpretation of dreams by interpreting the presence of certain elements or things, and among them is the dream of travel. Today we will learn about the meaning and interpretation of a dream about traveling in more than one place in the following: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about traveling. Ibn Sirin says: Whoever sees himself traveling, traveling means moving from one place to another, or a radical change in his life, and whoever sees himself traveling in an animal, the meaning of riding an animal It is getting what he wants. Ibn Shirin said: Whoever dreams that he is traveling by plane, he has a lot of desire, and whoever flies and travels with a wing, he moves from one state to another, and if he reaches the extent of his journey, then the journeys are good. And whoever sees that he is traveling and flying in the sky and disappears from his sight, he will die. If a poor person sees himself traveling in a dream, singing, and whoever travels to unknown, rugged places, this means that he will meet dangerous people in life or will contract some diseases. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is traveling by car, this indicates that he will advance in his career and will have new opportunities in his work. As for whoever sees himself traveling on foot, this indicates that he owes money. Interpretation of a dream about traveling for single people. In the interpretation of a dream about traveling for an unmarried woman, whoever sees in her dream a new suitcase while she is not married, this indicates marriage, and if the girl sees herself traveling by train, It means moving to a new life. Interpretation of a dream about traveling for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is traveling and carrying a heavy bag, this means that there will be a problem between her and her husband. A bag, this indicates that she will give birth to a child. Interpretation of a dream about traveling for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees that she is traveling in a dream and carrying a bag of new and beautiful clothes, this means that she will give birth to a healthy and healthy child, but if she dreams that she has a travel bag of old clothes, this means that the fetus He will suffer from health problems. Interpretation of returning from travel. Returning from travel indicates a person’s relief from his distress, the disappearance of his worries, his freedom from danger, or his repentance from the sin of what he did, and his return from sin.

title: Interpretation of cancer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of cancer in a dream: In our reality, it is one of the most common diseases that cause panic among people, because it is one of the most dangerous diseases that causes death. A state of fear, anxiety and anxiety, and he begins to think and become obsessed with fear and anxiety. But with research we found that scientists interpreted it in the opposite way to what we expect and fear, so we find that cancer in a dream is not as scary as it is in our reality. Therefore we decided to discuss in our article today the interpretation of seeing cancer in A dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of cancer in a dream. Seeing cancer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Since cancer is a malignant disease, seeing it in a dream is a sign of a person close to the fortune-teller who is hypocritical and deceiving him. Ibn Sirin emphasized that contracting cancer in a dream does not necessarily mean that he is infected with it, but rather expresses Tensions and psychological problems are disturbing the dreamer, and they are evidence of many crises in his life. The dreamer who saw himself or someone close to him sick with this cursed disease in his dream was a sign that the person afflicted in the dream had to change his life and lifestyle and pay more attention to his health. So. But if the dreamer sees himself in a dream suffering from cancer, this is evidence that the dreamer is the main cause of the problems in the house in which he lives. He also doubts someone close to him to the point that it affects him. Interpretation of cancer in a dream for a man: If the dreamer is male and sees himself suffering from cancer, this indicates his physical strength and good health, and contrary to what we expect, the dream does not have an indication of death, poverty, or illness. However, if a man sees his wife afflicted with cancer in her womb in a dream, this means that he will become angry with God Almighty and commit the immorality that God has forbidden to her, and he must be careful. But if a man sees in a dream a person he does not know who has cancer in his dream, this indicates many problems in his life. The dreamer's life that is difficult for him to solve. If a man dreams that he is suffering from lung cancer, this is a sign that he is very bored and wants to travel or change. Interpretation of cancer in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried or unmarried girl sees herself in her dream suffering from cancer This is good news for her that she will not contract any malignant or dangerous disease in her life, and her health will be good, and God is Most High and He knows best. However, an unmarried girl in a dream who has cancer indicates that she suffers from a feeling of distress and loneliness and that she needs someone who understands her feelings. But if an unmarried girl sees someone in her dream, but he has cancer, this indicates that there is someone who is planning her tragedies, conspiring against her, and trying with all his might. To trap her. Interpretation of cancer in a dream for a married woman, because cancer is one of the most dangerous diseases known. If a married woman sees herself sick with this cursed disease in her dream, this means that there is someone who hates her, deceives her, and betrays her, and shows her the opposite, so she should beware. If a married woman sees herself in a dream suffering from cancer, this is a sign that the insight is not personal. Good and does not have a good reputation, p

title: Interpretation of a dream about receiving a gold ring from a dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about receiving a gold ring from a dead person in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about receiving a gold ring from a dead person in a dream, one of the very disturbing dreams. In fact, he can make mistakes and get hurt, in addition to the fact that the site and its administrators have nothing to do with the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a gold ring from a dead person in a dream If one sees that he took a gold ring from the dead, this may indicate the abundance of livelihood that he obtains According to the dreamer in those days. In the event that one believes that he received a gold ring from the dead, this may indicate that he was in good health and free from the diseases that he was suffering from, thanks to God. If you see a golden ring in a dream, this may indicate a change in In circumstances for the better and getting rid of financial crises. If a person sees that he took a gold ring from a dead person in a dream, this may indicate the end of problems and worries in life thanks to God. Dreaming of receiving banknotes in a dream may indicate marital happiness that the dreamer was enjoying in his life at that time. Seeing paper money in a dream may indicate the diligence of a visionary in achieving his goals and ambitions. In If a married woman sees that she received banknotes in a dream, and there were a lot of them, this may indicate the happiness that she was enjoying in her life at that time, and God knows best. And in If a girl sees that she is taking medicine from someone, this may indicate the happiness that will come in her life at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about mistletoe for sheep by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about mistletoe sheep: Seeing mistletoe sheep in a person’s dream has many meanings and connotations, some of which translate into goodness and carry with them good news and good news, and others that lead to evil and dangers. In the following article.Interpretation of a dream about mistletoe sheep. Interpretation of a dream about mistletoe sheep for the dreamer has many meanings and repercussions, the most important of which are: If one sees mistletoe sheep in a dream, this is a clear indication that he will reap many material spoils and will receive many gifts and good deeds in the very near future. Seeing a mistletoe sheep in one’s dream means that he will have the opportunity to travel outside his home country, which will bring him great benefit and make him happy. Seeing an animal trader in his dream portends many mistletoe sheep a profitable trade and huge profits from it. Interpretation of a dream about a mistletoe sheep by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about a mistletoe sheep In a dream, from the point of view of Ibn Sirin, it has several interpretations, the most important of which is: If a person sees in his dream that he is eating lamb ghee with bread, then he will live a prosperous life full of prosperity and abundant luxury, with many benefits in the very near future. The interpretation of the dream indicates that he is eating bread with white ghee in The dream indicates that he will live long and be wealthy. If one sees in his dream that a large amount of mistletoe has failed, then this vision is praiseworthy and indicates that he will obtain a share in the property of one of his deceased relatives, which will restore his financial resources and advance him. To the near future. Interpretation of a dream about mistletoe by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi, one of the most famous scholars of interpretation, explained many indications of a dream about mistletoe, the most important of which are: If a person sees in his dream that his food contains sheep ghee, then he will soon go on a tourist trip outside his homeland. If a person sees in his dream that his food contains sheep ghee, he will soon go on a tourist trip outside his homeland. His dream is that he tastes sheep’s ghee, then he will be able to achieve all his goals and reach the height of glory. Al-Nabulsi also says that whoever dreams of smelling sheep’s mistletoe, this is a sign of his suffering from hardship of living and lack of financial resources. Interpretation of a dream of sheep’s mistletoe for a single womanIf the woman is unmarried and sees in Her dream is that she is eating ghee with her fiancé, then this is an indication of the extent of the connection between them and their marriage in the near future. If the Virgo is still studying and sees yellow ghee in her dream, this is a sign that she will excel in scientific fields and reach the peak of glory. If the Virgo is suffering from A serious illness and she saw white mistletoe in a dream, then she will wear the dress of luxury and regain her full health, which will have a positive impact on her psychological state. Watching a delicious meal being cooked and adding local mistletoe to it in the dream of a girl who has never been married before in a dream indicates the arrival of a pleasant occasion in the coming period. If a girl who is not in a relationship dreams of taking a box of ghee from her lover in a dream, it will be her future husband. If a virgin sees in her dream spoiled, inedible ghee, this is a sign that she is making her living from illegal sources. Interpretation of a dream about pouring mistletoe for single womenIf the fortuneteller is single She saw it in her dream
